qa_list.question: What is the name of the department(s) that Daniel Fried belongs to?
Where is the office location of Daniel Fried?
What are some of Professor Daniel Fried's research interests?
qa_list.answer: Natural Language Processing, Conversational AI, Intelligent Agents and Dialogue, Discourse and Pragmatics, Multimodal AI

qa_list.question: What is the name of the degree that Daniel Fried offers?
qa_list.answer: Master of Science in Intelligent Information Systems
